title: Izmir soya kofte balls (meatfree meatballs)
ingredients: ['250g of soya mince', '3 - 4 tomatoes, cut into eighths', '1 big or 2 medium peppers, seeded and sliced lengthways', '2 - 3 medium size potatoes, cut into eighths', '1 onion, grated nicely in a bowl', '1 egg', 'handful of parsley, chopped', 'breadcrumbs (as much as the kofte need)', '2 or 3 spoonfuls of tomato puree', 'red chilli flakes', 'cumin', 'curry powder', 'thyme', 'salt and black pepper']
